original_text: They put a notice there to show the reason why they were killing him. It said, ‘The King of the Jews’.
korean_text: 그 위에 있는 죄패에 유대인의 왕이라 썼고

sentences.original_text: to show the reason why they were killing him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 죽이는 이유를 알리기 위해

sentences.original_text: It said, 'The King of the Jews'
